DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria individual low back pain : Age : 1845 year old At least 1 year low back pain with/without refer pain buttock/thigh At least 3 episode disable low back pain At least score 20 % Oswestry Disability Index Willingness sign inform consent Inclusion Criteria healthy individual : Age : 1845 year old No history low back pain A score 0 % Oswestry Disability Index Willingness sign inform consent History major trauma and/or major orthopedic surgery spine , pelvis low quadrant One follow condition : Parkinson , multiple sclerosis , stroke , history vestibular disorder , respiratory disease , pregnancy Radicular symptom Not Dutchspeaking Strong opioids Neck pain Smoking history
